website_summaries.verdict: The best available. Individualized program that accompanies alarm puts it at the top of our shortlist.
pros: A research-backed design that allows users to customize for individual needs using online programming
Geared to children and young adults
cons: Quite expensive, but offers more than just an alarm to help solve bedwetting issues

customer_reviews.title: Never a dry night....
customer_reviews.text: As the parent of a 12-year-old that has never had one dry night, I have to say we are thrilled with the progress! We are coming to the end of our fourth week and have had TWELVE dry nights. We are amazed, my son included. If only we would have heard about Therapee sooner. We've tried restricting fluids after 6 PM, taking to the bathroom in the middle of the night, alarms and medicine. Even titrating to a higher dose of medicine didn't work. If you're reading this, you know how devastating this can be for your child. Yes, this treatment is a bit pricey however, so are the countless pull ups ...well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory but not for our kid
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory but not for our kid. Company allowed us to return it. Our kid sweats so much it was going off on the lowest sensitivity when he hadn't wet himself and wasn't wet to the touch with sweat. Just a bit too sensitive and had us all waking up for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: worked fine for 7 days and then would go off when my poor son was sleeping
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for 7 days and then would go off when my poor son was sleeping and dry, and then would not go off when he did urinate. it's also disappointing how in the FAQ's all the points are pro-therapee and not one about how the unit can malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Reena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. It worked- after nothing else had. We have tried other bedwetting alarms, DDAVP pill, pull-ups, limiting fluids, waking throughout the night, everything!! This product is absolutely amazing! Being awoken by the alarms wasn't pleasant, but between that and the therapy sessions with the Dr. and charting progress with the stars online, the motivation- or something- worked! And within the first few weeks!! We are so thrilled and grateful for this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: McK

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old son after many visits to the urologist and their “program” wasn’t working. My son was demoralized and upset. The first two weeks were hard...waking up 2-3 times per night. We were all tired and grumpy and weren’t seeing any improvements, in fact he wasn’t even waking up to the alarm half the time. We stuck with it and by week 4 he had the first dry night of his 8 year life!!! And by week 6 he was dry every night. The price was hard to swallow initially but it was worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: BJK_CO

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t given up
customer_reviews.text: We are on day 5. False alarm at 3:00. It’s like having an infant in our house. I chose to unplug it so we could all sleep. Wakes the entire house.
customer_reviews.author: andreab

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It’s crap, went off when there was no urine in the middle of the night. When there was urine it did not sound.
customer_reviews.author: deb cox

customer_reviews.title: Finally Free!
customer_reviews.text: Our ten year old daughter had maybe one dry night in her whole life before beginning the Therapee program. It was expensive, for sure, but after the first few weeks, she has not had a single wet night. She has now been since the beginning of December (about three months)...not a single wet night! She is so pleased, as are we. The pad, the videos, the explanations and exercises were all top notch. She felt like she had a cheerleader the whole time and the software gave her an easy way to track and celebrate her accomplishments. We could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: theologicalbookworm

customer_reviews.title: After a few weeks, it suddenly started working for our child!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it worked. I was really skeptical. Things were a little rough for the first 3-4 weeks, with a lot of late night alarms. Then everything suddenly started clicking for the child. Unbelievable. The child now wakes up in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom, and no need to avoid liquids late at night. I am really curious what triggered the change, as it was totally not expected. We see dry undies every night now!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Smith

customer_reviews.title: **Not money back guarantee** Therapee will not help if it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for our son because he is terrified of alarms, and there’s not really an option for a low sound like they said. **If your looking at buying this, know they will not give you your money back if you buy it off Amazon.** They told me to wait until he’s more mature-he’s almost 10,. Now, I’m stuck with a $300 mat.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Too many false alarms
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product and had great hopes for it after reading all of the reviews but I could not take the nightly false alarms. I changed the sensitivity level but that didn't work. As a person who has a problem with sleeping this did not help. Everytime the alarm went off I'd have to jump up and go to my child's room only to find she was dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! Bought this for my 7 year old son. He would wet the bed almost every night and sometimes multiple times a night. I couldn’t take any more laundry and sleepless nights changing sheets. He started out slow in the first few weeks with a mix of dry nights and wet nights. Within less than a month he started showing progress. After 2 months he had several weeks in a row with no bed wetting. Just under 3 months now and he hasn’t wet the bed in 4 weeks. I think we are in the clear now! It’s pricey and I was skeptical, but I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: mcj50

customer_reviews.title: This Works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 7.5 yo who was growing increasingly uncomfortable and embarrassed by her body's inability to not wet the bed every night. We went from one dry night a month to 40 dry nights in a row within eight weeks. The experience and progression with TheraPee was fast, encouraging, positive, and easy. Bedwetting is genetic, frustrating, and NOT your child's fault. This system gave us the tools we needed to support our child and help her help herself! It is empowering as a parent and to a little girl. Life's hard enough - learning the skills and tools to not wet the bed at night has been a gift. This was worth every single penny spent!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 7.5 YO

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son was upset because he still wet the bed at night. The Therapee program worked wonders for him! After 8 nights of waking up to the alarm (which is quite loud), he has not had a wet night again. He has graduated from the program and doesn't use the pad anymore although we do practice some of the exercises that were recommended for him. He feels so much more confident now that he is dry at night and now is asking to have sleepovers with his friends!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, we tried everything with our 5 year old. Nothing worked. Then we got Therapee and it worked! It took 9 days to have a dry night. Then, there were 1-2 accidents over the next month. Then, every night was dry. We really can't believe it. We didn't change any other behavior other than using Therapee. One tip: when you're starting out and you're unlikely to have dry nights, have extra sheets and PJ's ready, so you can change the bed and your kid quickly at night. It's a pain to go looking for sheets and clothes in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Bukmar

customer_reviews.title: This actually works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I saw this, we had tried other alarms without success along with every other thing we could possibly find that might help. My 12 year old stopped wetting the bed after 5 months and then I bought the online program a second time to work with my 8 year old. It worked for the 8 year old in 3 months. After 12 years of changing sheets EVERY day... I'm so grateful that everyone is dry! Thank you Dr. Sagie
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I cannot believe it worked! It really worked!
customer_reviews.text: This was our 3 alarm system. We had tried everything for my son who is now a teenager, alarms and medicine. I was super skeptical, but desperate. After reading other parent's reviews, and I knew that I had to keep looking for a solution for my son. It was challenging at times, but 20 weeks into this we have had success for 6 weeks straight. This has changed our lives, my only regret is not doing it years ago. They also had great customer service, and went above and beyond to help us.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how well it worked
customer_reviews.text: Our child was having issues where he wet the bed every night. We had tried things like waking him up, limiting beverages before bed, etc and nothing worked. We bought this with some skepticism but as we were not able to get anything to work - we figured what else do we have to lose? And it worked. Very well. Within 3 weeks he pretty much stopped bed wetting. We were able to go on vacation without any issues. We would highly recommend this product for anyone going through bed wetting with their kids right now.
customer_reviews.author: F. M. Straka

customer_reviews.title: Truly worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing! I am the biggest skeptic you will ever meet! But I was desperate. My son wet the bed consistently, and he’s 9. This was a last ditch, expensive effort! It worked within 2 weeks!! I am completely thrilled!! No accidents! 2 weeks is all it took for him! He’s not scared to spend the night anywhere any more. :). I wish I’d done this years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele L.

customer_reviews.title: Very successful program
customer_reviews.text: Very good success with this. Used for three months and worked as suggested. A lot of people comment about the mat, how well it worked or didn't work (I'm not sure why someone wouldn't request a new mat if it wasn't working though); but I think the key for my daughter was the different exercises they had her do during the program. She was very committed and did them faithfully. She is 9 years old. She now hasn't had an accident in over four months straight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanniekay Zinda

customer_reviews.title: This really works & we are so grateful!
customer_reviews.text: People listen up! This system works - really! Don’t hesitate to buy this. We’ve seen immediate results and the approach is positive and reassuring. My child totally bought in to the system immediately. It’s easy to use - simple even. It’s an alarm (which up u til now kinda scared me) but I now realize my child is a super deep sleeper and this is the missing link. There’s more to the program but the bed wetting alarm was the key for us. Highly recommend and grateful I found this system! I hope this helps someone out there who was also hesitant to try it based on the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Pot

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: Our son is 7 years old and consistently wet his pull up diapers very night. We had tried many things and were looking for a proven solution. At first, I was hesitant to purchase TheraPee because the price was more expensive than other options. Then I read all the positive reviews online and decided to purchase it. The first couple weeks our son continued to wet the bed and I grew skeptical. Then about the third week he began to consistently wake up dry, but still wet the bed occasionally. Things continued to improve each week and now it has been a couple months since the last wet bed. Most importantly, he's a more confident boy now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed wetting alarm seemed pretty expensive... However I have to say at works! It really really works! My 8 year old son wet to bed every night. After three nights of the alarm going off, he was dry one night. Then he wet two nights and then he was dry. Then wet the next night. And dry the following night. After two weeks of this he has been dry ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My son wore pull ups and was wet every single night through his 7th birthday. The doctor kept telling us he had no issues and would outgrow it, but I decided to give this a try while we were quarantined at home. The first couple months he still wet the bed frequently, but we stuck strong with the exercises and instructions from the company. I even reached out to them a few times and they were extremely helpful and encouraging. After a little over 5 months, my son has graduated from the program. He was so excited when he got to the point of gold stars and feels so great about himself. I would recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: 100% SUCCESS
customer_reviews.text: We tried everything we could to help my son with his bedwetting problem. He is 10 years old and it was starting to affect his confidence and he felt like he would never be able to overcome this issue. I found Therapee online and started the program, within a few weeks we already saw improvement. We have now completed the program and it was 100% success. I would highly recommend this program to any parent and child going through the same thing. It was life-changing for my son and I am so happy for him!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our 9 year old despite the crazy price. It was definitely worth every penny. Within 4 weeks he was down to wetting only 1-2 times per week. Since week 5 he has never wet again. We have had 32 straight nights with no issues! AMAZING! I would recommend to anyone struggling with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heft

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the time and the money
customer_reviews.text: The product was fabulous. The techniques used absolutely work and the education behind each technique makes complete sense. We're thankful for Therapee and proud of my son and for my son. He is 6 years old and finally can wear underwear all night. Yes, the product is expensive, and yes it's a process, but like anything, it's a temporary process that if used the way shown, especially for the first 3 months, is worth the money and you WILL be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 8 and was having to wear diapers with extra absorbent pads every night and the pediatrician said we could try meds, which I did not want to do. When my mother-in-law wanted to take him to a chiropractor I decided to buy this product that I saw advertised on Facebook. It only took a couple weeks to start working and after a couple months he was completely finished with wetting the bed and he has had no relaspes! He’s been dry for months!! It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sarantos

customer_reviews.title: Therapee is legit and it worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was our last resort after trying several cheaper alarms, basically dehydrating my child, getting up 2x a night, doctor visits, etc. The first few weeks were exhausting bc my 12 year old was going 2-3xs a night, but within a few weeks, that dropped to 1x, then we started having dry nights, then weeks, and now we are on our final leg of the program. It has been so great!!!!! I’m soooo glad we were able to give my kiddo confidence at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Best bed wetting solution out there
customer_reviews.text: We have tried everything to help our 6.5 year with his bed wetting but have been unsuccessful until now. This system is so easy to use and the online interface is awesome. My son is eager to log his nights sleep every morning and really looks forward to his “sessions” with the doctor. My son is doing so great with this system and is dry nearly every morning now. I could t recommend this system more.
customer_reviews.author: danielle thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for deep sleepers who don't wake up
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product because our 10-year old son would sleep so deeply at night that he could not wake if he had to use the bathroom. Even if we woke him up ourselves, he could hardly come out of his deep sleep and the next morning he could not remember that we woke him up. We tried a smaller (less expensive) wet alarm in the past, but did not succeed. Based on the excellent reviews, we tried this product and it worked exactly as promised. The online instructions and progress chart with 2-week check-ins supported his learning, and after just 6-weeks of using the system he is dry every night.
customer_reviews.author: Mbreimann

customer_reviews.title: Believe it - it’s true - this actually works!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son had been wetting the bed every night his entire life and I thought he’d grow out of it. But he came to me embarrassed to sleep over with his cousins because he had to wear a diaper in front of them. I bought this after reading the reviews and speaking with my pediatrician. The first 10 days were wet and after that he only wet the bed 6 times in 7 weeks. It was incredible! He loved the star charts and feels immensely proud of his “graduation.” In 3 months since his “graduation” he has only had one tiny accident. I highly recommend this program!
customer_reviews.author: HappyMom

customer_reviews.title: Builds confidence and really works!
customer_reviews.text: We had tried everything with our 8 year old daughter. She was beginning to feel bad about herself and her situation, especially since her older sister and younger brother never experienced consistent bedwetting. Our pediatrician recommended we try Therapee after having great success with her own children. Within a week, our daughter was sleeping through the night and STAYING DRY!! We are two months in and she has only had occasionally accidents since we began the Therapee program. Her confidence is building and the "sessions" with Dr. Sagie have also been encouraging to her.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sugiura

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: SO excited to get to write this review! This product works! After wetting the bed most nights for years, this product taught my daughter how to wake up and use the bathroom. We no longer have accidents. Life changing and amazing! My biggest regret is that I should have started this sooner. I will say the first couple weeks are very difficult. The alarm had us all waking up, but then it clicked and no more accidents or alarms. As a bedwetter myself, I know how awful I felt. This works and now my daughter doesn’t have to worry about this. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret K.

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old daughter was wetting the bed about five nights a week when we started the program. After about a month, she was wetting the bed maybe two nights a week. It's four months later, and she hasn't wet the bed in at least nine weeks. As far as we're concerned, the program is a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaL

customer_reviews.title: He feels so good about his success!
customer_reviews.text: I just wish I had bought this sooner. If you have a 6, 7, 8 or more year old, don’t wait. This is what you need to help them! I can’t believe the progress he’s making. He feels so proud. I feel so proud. If there was a way to give this more stars, I would!
customer_reviews.author: LRYAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product and makes sense...
customer_reviews.text: We used this for my young 7 year old son who was very heavy sleeper. The first two weeks required planning and knowing that you will be up at night. After that, he caught on. The coaching, the information, and the exercises are useful and easy for my son to do. They also provided encouragement and support for him (and for me!). I am very happy with this product and the content (thanks Dr. S!).
customer_reviews.author: Branman1986

customer_reviews.title: Wetting the bed? Get this today!  It works.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple. Son is 8 and had been never really been dry one night, except for a brief period when he was 4. Was spending money every week buying pull ups and even then would soak the bed even then. No other issues other than wetting each night. Started the program and was wet 8 of 14 nights the first 2 weeks. After that was wet 3 more times over 6 weeks and is now 100% dry each night. Program literally paid for itself w/ no more pull ups and fixing a problem none of my other 2 kids experienced. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PO

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $ investment
customer_reviews.text: Our son (7) is about to finish his 'treatment' (as Dr Sagie refers to it), and has been having dry nights ever since week 2 of using this mat. This is after several years of wearing nighttime diapers & waking him multiple times during the night, depriving him of water after 6pm, and trying a wear-on alarm - all unsuccessfully to the point where it was affecting his self-confidence. I can't believe what a difference this product has made - I had just about given up and was considering medical intervention when I came across the Therapee mat. I'm so glad we gave it a shot expensive as it is! I'd highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sinay

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great for my daughter. We had tried various alarms and other techniques without success. We liked the online progress chart and videos along the way and how the therapy was customized to address my daughter's particular needs. This is not just a simple alarm. You are expected to track the size and time of the accidents and fill out the daily chart. There are also exercises incorporated into the therapy along the way. I guess what I am trying to say is to get the most out of it, you really have to be committed and do the things it suggests. It definitely worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: ATW

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product at the recommendation of my pediatrician and then put off trying it for many months. It never seemed like the right time to commit to the program. I finally started the program and am kicking myself for waiting. My 11 year old son wet the bed every night and would wet through a pull up. I changed his sheets EVERY day. After just a couple weeks on the program he started having dry nights, and he has now had 8 weeks of being dry. It is truly a life changing situation for all of us. I wish I had done the program sooner but am so glad we finally did it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever, this progam works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write reviews but this program works and has made a huge impact on our childs life. We have tried many different things over the years and nothing helped so we were very skeptical before we enrolled in this program. The program is very simple to follow and the equipment is high quality. I would suggest this to anyone with this issue. I just wish we would have found this earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Young

customer_reviews.title: Great program
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old wet the bed every night...most nights wetting through her overnight diaper. She couldn't go to camp or to sleepovers. We tried eliminating fluids after dinner, making sure she went to the bathroom right before bed. Nothing helped. After 12 weeks on this program she is dry every morning! She improved right away and stopped having wet nights almost immediately. She loved seeing her progress and putting her stars on the chart! She was so excited and proud of herself when she got the CONGRATULATIONS you had finished the program! i highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after 2 months. Will no longer stay on, even with new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Anstead

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money- it works!!
customer_reviews.text: This helped my daughter finally stop setting her bed! She has suffered through bed wetting for years and years. We finally took the plunge and spent money on this system and it worked!!! It’s absolutely amazing. I truly do not have words to express my gratitude. For all parents out there that have watched their older children struggle with the embarrassment of bed wetting this system works. It has been 3 months Since we started and my daughter has not wet the bed in one month! This is the positive momentum she needed. Thank you Therapee!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Jerue Gullo

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us
customer_reviews.text: We had tried almost everything with our 10 year old son. He was consistently waking up with soaked and overflowing pull ups. We were hesitant to try Therapee due to the cost, but considering how much we were spending on pull ups and laundry, it was worth a shot. We got a prescription from his doctor and used our HSA to pay for it. After just 2 weeks he was dry. The initial work of getting up with the alarm was annoying, but the results were definitely worth it. He’s so happy to now be able to go to camp and sleepovers without possible embarrassment. And his room smells a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had considered buying Therapee at least a year ago but hesitated because of the price. Instead we tried an alarm clock, a bedwetting watch, incentives, and everything else. We were spending a fortune on pullups to avoid changing sheets every night. Finally I ordered Therapee a few months ago. My daughter had her first dry night within the first week. After that she improved quickly. Within just a few weeks we went from nightly accidents to 1 or 2 per week and by six weeks, she was dry EVERY night! I was amazed and this is seriously WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M

customer_reviews.title: Magic product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I bought 2 sets as I wanted to use it for both my children (age 4 and 5) at the same time, my son has some mild special needs and it worked very well for him. Both children were dry through the night within 3 weeks for my daughter and 6 weeks for my son. They loved getting the video messages and getting a gold star was a VERY BIG DEAL. It’s not cheap but it’s magic and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs U

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This really does work! My son is 11 years old and is a hard sleeper. He NEVER had a dry night and therefore I was constantly during laundry since a pullup at his age didn't always work. He has not been able to enjoy sleepovers with friends and just embarrassed that he had to wear pull-ups at night. Up until therapee, we have tried everything.... I mean everything. It took about three weeks and he is now he is dry overnight. He is PROUD of himself and is now ready for his first sleepover. Its a lot of work on the parents end but WELL worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Why did we not find this earlier!
customer_reviews.text: It has been 5 weeks of using this. After more than 9 years of bedwetting, DD has been dry for past 2 weeks. We are all so elated that she will sleep dry on her 10th birthday which is a few months away. The third week had 5 dry days in a row and just when we were getting all excited about the first week for being dry, there was an accident. The exercises then kicked in and she has been dry for last 2 weeks.She wakes up at night and uses the toilet. Hurray!!
customer_reviews.author: supan

customer_reviews.title: Best bed wetting product
customer_reviews.text: We used this after using many other products for our bed wetting 11-year-old. The guidance and mentoring helped her be dry after 2 weeks using this pad. Best money we have ever spent. The science and tech is basic, but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S Freire

customer_reviews.title: But he's done fantastic. His self confidence has increased
customer_reviews.text: This product was astonishingly effective. In just under two weeks' time we saw a drastic reduction in wet nights. In a month and a half, he had gone a full two weeks without a wet night. We started this program at Christmas. He was done sleeping on the pad by March. And he hasn't had a single accident since! He's 11 years old and we were getting worried about how he would do with scout camp outs, etc. But he's done fantastic. His self confidence has increased, too. I'm so glad we went with this.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: 7 yr. old done wetting the bed now!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to spend the money on this, but the reviews seemed promising. My son (7) had never went a night without wetting the bed since he was 3. Sometimes twice a night. I never would’ve believed that just 3 weeks into this he would be done wetting the bed! But it worked. Fast! It’s Unbelievable! Life changing for us. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this product REALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: I'd add to what others have said. This product REALLY works. I have twin 6-year-olds who were both (!) super resistant to getting out of pull-ups. This system worked like a charm for both of them, albeit one took an extra week (but sometimes competition is a good thing). The fact that they get involved with recording their progress on line and watching the videos definitely enhanced their enthusiasm for the process. They were so proud to drag those stars down and record their successful dry nights. I really can't recommend it highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A Sinding

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this product a try for my 6 year old bedwetter and can't even believe how quickly it worked. After a couple of weeks she started having dry nights and now she has been dry for 1.5 months. The videos, the challenge and specially the stars chart got her super excited and eager to succeed. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a game changer for our child! We never could have imagined how quickly it was effective. We were worried about interrupted sleep, changing a habit that was so established, and the system being uncomfortable. Thankfully all of our concerns were for naught!! Our son adapted quickly to the system. He didn't seem to even notice it unless he had an accident. The nighttime wettings ended within in the first month and our son's confidence soared!! We couldn't be happier, we are so grateful for the the Therapee system, it was worth EVERY penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Therrian

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: After trying various alarms we finally tried Therapee with our 8 year old. We are amazed with the results. He is now after 4 months totally dry ( has been for about 2 months ) before then it was a steady progress every week. He had never had a dry night in his life before therapee. We are so happy we finally broke down and payed for Therapee , even though we first hesitated at the cost. SOOOOO worth every penny! Our son has gained so much self confidence. The customer service is also great, always superfast at responding to any questions. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rafaela Persson

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that it worked. Nine years of wet nights and we are all dry. The biggest difference between this and any other alarm is the child’s participation. My daughter was ready and she was the one doing the tracking. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: littlesandy

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe it worked! My son who is nearly 7 had never had a dry night ever. We decided to try Therapee as previously lifting him hadn’t worked. Lockdown seemed the perfect time to start. We had two weeks of hell as he wet the bed three times a night. Then he just stopped! It’s a combination of the online advice and the alarm system. He liked collecting the stars. We live in Singapore so it’s very hot here. We did have to adjust the sensitivity as sweat can set it off. My son also had to wear PJ top to stop this happening.
customer_reviews.author: mrs r sellers

customer_reviews.title: Has the ability  to work.......
customer_reviews.text: At first we would have given 5 stars. After 5 days and warmer weather the device started having alarms due to our child sweating. We followed the directions for adjusting the sensitivity. Unfortunately the issue continues so we are returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This was a heaven sent! Our daughter struggled for seven years with constant bed wetting. She sleeps so deep that even when I woke her she couldn’t walk to the bathroom on her own. I had practically lost hope and was going to turn to bladder control pharmaceuticals from her doctor. In a matter of two weeks with Therapee, she started getting up on her own with no accidents. Now I don’t even worry about accidents. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer123

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have heard about this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Started the program Aug 27th. It's been amazing!! My Son is nine and rarely had a dry night. We loved the intro video explaining that peeing the bed isn't the child's fault and is a very common thing. Since starting my Son has had more dry nights the not and we feel like he is very close to staying dry always. So far in Oct he's only had one wet night. He loves the program and is so proud of himself. It's a real confidence booster and makes for happy mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Grimes

customer_reviews.title: This really worked for my 8yo son
customer_reviews.text: I’m about a skeptical as it gets. The price was painful but I was willing to try anything to get my 8yo to stop wetting the bed. This program really worked! I think the combination of not sleeping in an absorbent pull-up and not wanting his sleep interrupted by the alarm encouraged him to do the exercises. It’s a whole new world for him now! I highly recommend this program.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hammitt

customer_reviews.title: Miracle story
customer_reviews.text: It s a magic. Perfect gift for my sons 10 th birthday. The first week we used it the alarm rang and he pee in the bed. The next week it was more towards the morning time the bed wettting. Then dr sages video and exercises he watched and did it religiously. He then started showing improvement and putting his own stars in the chart. He was so happy. Then we had 1 or 2 accidents. And that’s it. We said bye to bed wetting. In 2 months. Now since March of 2018 we r are free of bed wetting. My son is so proud of himself and happy.
customer_reviews.author: KOSH RAJAN

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old was still wearing pull ups and embarrassed by it. Our doctor kept saying wait until he is 7 or older to try an alarm. I gave this a try anyway and I couldn't be happier! Our son is 3 months in and he has had 10 dry nights in a row. It is a process. Those first 2 or 3 weeks are a lot of changing the sheets. Trust the process and it is so worth it. My son is now proud of himself and no longer embarrassed! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally....success.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even pinpoint what worked about this that didn't work about other alarms or forms of therapy. But this, indeed, worked for my teenage son in a matter of weeks and, for that, it's the best product ever.
customer_reviews.author: Long_time_customer

customer_reviews.title: but it gradually got better and better as he did what the program said
customer_reviews.text: We tried so many different things to help our son stop bed wetting, but nothing worked. This program has been such a blessing. It was tough the first month or so of the program getting up in the night so often, but it gradually got better and better as he did what the program said. So don’t give up if it is tough, stay with it and give it time. He has had success and has now graduated from the program. I would HIGHLY recommended Therapee to anyone that has a child that is a bed wetter. It is a lot of money, but so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is your solution to help your child!
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old has never had a dry night. We went to doctors who wanted to put him on meds. Vasopressin! Crazy! We tried the alarm and that never worked. He didn’t like it pinned to him or having the clip on his underwear. The alarm startled him so much and woke the whole house up. Then we found therapee. Wow! Within two months he’s dry every night! He went to an overnight camp for the first time and can now go to sleepovers with friends. This is a miracle, at least for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow the Program, It Works
customer_reviews.text: It worked for my 9 year old son. He sleeps so hard, there were times the therapee alarm couldn't wake him up, neither could I, he just had to sleep in it. He had a few successful nights here and there, then after about 5 weeks he didn't have any more accidents again for about 2 months now. Amazing! Just follow the program and do what they say, eventually it works.
customer_reviews.author: holdreaw

customer_reviews.title: I really wasn't sure that this program would work for ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't sure that this program would work for my 10-year-old son who would even wet the bed through a night diaper most nights, but here we are at 12 weeks into the program, and he has graduated! After a bumpy first few weeks, he has been consistently dry for the past 8 weeks, and he is so proud of himself. He had his first sleepover last night, and I can only say that I am relieved and grateful. This program works! It's not just the alarm pad, which you can find elsewhere for less money, but the videos providing behavioral therapy in the form of exercises, explanation, and validation. Absolutely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ginjer L Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Successful Program
customer_reviews.text: Our son had peed the bed basically every night for 10 years. 3 months on this program and he now gets up and goes to the bathroom every night. He hasn’t had an accident in 2 months. We are so happy to have found this.
customer_reviews.author: ZMan11

customer_reviews.title: worked for our 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: We did this program with our 7 year old for about a month and had tremendous success. I gave him the choice to start when he wanted and he was pretty excited about the star chart so we started right away. Together, we had a good laugh at the accompanying videos. After 2 weeks he stopped wetting the bed and has had only a handful of accidents since. I recommend this program without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay A Pavelka

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased and my son is happy that he can go ...
customer_reviews.text: This program was successful for us. We started it because my 7 year old was hoping to go to an overnight camp this summer for 2 nights and he was worried about wetting the bed. I rarely write reviews but this program and the service you receive is deserving of one. I was having some problems with the alarm and emailed the support contact. They were very responsive and actually ended up calling me to resolve the issue. The error was mine but they were helpful in resolving it.We followed the program as closely as possible and it worked well for us. I am pleased and my son is happy that he can go to camp without worrying about bedwetting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep Going! Don't Stop!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a success for our son. The key for us was not to give up! The device triggers an audible alarm when it feels moisture so you be woken up from a deep sleep night after night for the first week or so. Just like Pavlov's dogs - a bell rings and they salivate. In this case, an alarm sounds to wake you and help your child to go to the potty. Don't let that deter you! THIS PRODUCT WILL HELP YOUR CHILD STOP WETTING THE BED! That is the prize, after all - so don't give up!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Davis

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Therapee for my 7 year old daughter who had never had a dry night in her life without help from a prescription from her pediatrician (but she hated the way the meds made her feel). The first week was rough but we saw signs of hope with less frequent urination & her actually waking up when she went. Within 10 days, she was completely “cured” - it has been 6 months & she has not had an incident since! I was shocked at how well it worked & how quickly! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. All I can say is that it worked! The equipment operated as described, and the online video sessions and charting aspect were perfect for our son. This online aspect, I think, is what really motivated him, and is what sets this program apart from others with just the alarm. We are extremely satisfied. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for this amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old was struggling with bedwetting and could not get hold of it. This product, both the alarm and the advice from Dr. Sagee was life changing for her and all of us. Dr. Sagee made her feel normal and provided excellent feedback for her. The chart was easy to use. I highly recommend this investment. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at other products in the market, I settled for the TheraPee treatment. With the TheraPee system my child and I are not trying to do this alone, but with the guidance of Dr. Sagie. I also like the fact that they are available to answer questions via email. We log in our daily progress, listen to each video session, and after beginning the exercises recommended, my son is doing much better. It has been a month since he last wet his bed, he seems more confident, and I am a happy mother. TheraPee has been a great investment, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina B.

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: We tried using this for the obvious reason and the alarm wasn't loud enough to wake my child. We did have some false alarms and we were able to adjust the sensitivity. That performed predictably. In the end what works is a clock radio/alarm set at 2:00 am and a prescription for Desmopressin. Too bad for us we are a few days over our return period.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah H.

customer_reviews.title: This has been the answer to our prayers
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for almost two months and our thrilled with the success that has followed its arrival. In combination with the videos that come every two weeks this system has been spectacular for our 8-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Newton

customer_reviews.title: I can't even give a proper review because out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't even give a proper review because out of the box the unit did not work. It gets "0" stars! Just received Tuesday, 1/23/18. Tried the batteries that came with the product and brand new batteries and yes, they were installed correctly. No power, the unit never powered on! Very pissed off and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: KDS

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This may be the first review I have ever written. This product really worked. I was very involved in the process with my 9 year old, but almost within the first two weeks he had stopped wetting the bed. He completed the process and has only had a couple accidents since. He had probably not had 10 dry nights in his entire life. Now we don't have to worry. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Best way to end bedwetting
customer_reviews.text: It literally took 2 weeks and my daughter was done. She was 11 at the time. We had tried everything, including a medication that ended up causing a seizure so I swore no more medication for this issue. If I had to do it again, this would be the only thing I would use. Videos and advice were great.
customer_reviews.author: nr

customer_reviews.title: The only treatment that works!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited for my 8 year old son. He has never made it through the night without wetting the bed until we started using Therapee! We tried medication, alarms and diapers all to no avail. I hesitated to buy this because it is expensive, but it works! He is so happy because he can now have friends come for sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it does not work
customer_reviews.text: the item does not i been trying to return the item ans ups as been a joke and would nit return it for me
customer_reviews.author: robin West

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well but it broke shortly after we got it. It only lasted about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Al Pal

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my daughter gain the confidence she needs. It took her about 4 weeks and then she would wake up herself and go to the bathroom. Best thing ever I could of purchased. Now she is not embarrassed anymore to have to wear diapers at night. It is underwear.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Interactive program is engaging and encouraging.
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found this! I love that it comes with a program and not just a device. My daughter looks forward to logging her results and is well on her way to having dry nights!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: After trying for years, this product is working in the first week!!!! My 12-year-old son was very embarrassed about his problem. We tried other alarms with no success. He has never had a dry night! This product worked for him immediately. We are in week one with 3 dry nights in a row already. He is waking up when the alarms goes off -which is very encouraging!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This process and product works
customer_reviews.text: After first purchasing a competitor's product (and returning it before I even started), I realized that TheraPee's secret sauce was that it was simple to use and would not interfere with my child's ability to fall asleep. It was. Plus, the ability to track progress and get coaching was very positive. This process went by quickly and was an easy lift for my child. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan Ginther

customer_reviews.title: This REALLY works!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually write reviews but felt compelled to do so on this item. Was skeptical prior to purchasing as it inst cheap but this actually worked when nothing else would. We tried other products and methods but to no avail. For all those on the fence, do not hesitate this is the real deal. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: R89

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!  This worked for our 8 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 8 year old that was understandably tired of wearing pull ups. We wouldn't take him off the pull ups because he was still waking up wet every night. It took about a month of accidents every night but since then he has been accident free for 2 months! He is so happy and more confident in himself. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Gurriere

customer_reviews.title: I got the alarm replaced but still devices mulfunction for the money i gave paid this is very poor experience.
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied as the product stop working after 3-4 times ysage. I got the alarm replaced but still devices mulfunction for the money i gave paid this is very poor experience.
customer_reviews.author: O. Oz

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly. We followed all the steps and it worked as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This totally worked for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: We had tried SO MANY things, and nothing worked. We tried for years. But this program really truly worked. My daughter was a tough case, I'd bet. It took about 2 months to have 100% dry nights, but you could tell right away this was different. My daughter is so excited, relieved and proud of herself. THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: IMF

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great follow up!
customer_reviews.text: Over 4 years we tried several other things with doctors reccommedation, nothing worked properly. We were hestitant of buying this product because of its price, but when we finally bought it it took only 4 days to be completely dry. Thank you so much Dr. Sagie
customer_reviews.author: Arni Hafsteinsson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing progress amazing success wowow life is new with a dry child's bed! The interaction and video tutorial that explains to the child that he's normal is awesome
customer_reviews.author: toby straus

customer_reviews.title: Be patient - it works
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 y/o boy potty trained very easily by the time he was 3 - but could never get out of a pullup at night. No matter what we tried - he would soak the bed. Weeks 1-4 he was hardly dry on this system. Be patient. We are in week 7 and he's been dry 8 out of the last 9 nights. The process they have you follow takes work and diligence but my son is very engaged in the process and is gaining so much confidence. Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This will take some effort from both parent and child but it is also pretty flexible. We did not follow every facet of the program and ended up getting fantastic results regardless. We had a couple weeks of sleepless nights but then the effects kicked in and our child feels so much better about himself. Not too mention everybody is getting a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked for 12 yo
customer_reviews.text: Was a great way for him to be involved. He used the calendar and watched videos. Alarm was sensitive and sometimes if he sweated a lot it went off. It has been a really long road wetting most nights. We tried all kinds of things, alarm sensors, special socks, guided imagery and meditation, all didn't work. Overall couldn't be more happy with Therapee, he went from wetting every night to months not wetting!
customer_reviews.author: ALR

product_meta.title: TheraPee - The World's #1 Bedwetting Solution
feature_bullets: The original 'TheraPee' Bedwetting Solution sold directly by Dr. Sagie's Bedwetting Clinics
Includes: Unlimited license - for THERAPEE's online interactive software program (designed for one patient).
Includes: STOPEE -the most advanced and safe bed-pad and alarm system available today. CE Mark and FDA registered
Interactive and engaging - With state-of-the-art software and videos
100% online and automated - Simply enter your information and a customized, step-by-step and interactive program is designed and delivered instantly online to you and your child
